title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin looks at Tiger Woods' return to professional golf and while his comeback story is remarkable, Colin thinks we should slow down on the expectations of winning tournaments. He believes one NFL team could be making a big mistake if they over pay for this superstar wide receiver. He also thinks LeBron James is no longer valued as an elite teammate in today's NBA. Plus, long time NFL scout and Super Bowl champion Jim Nagy joins the show to breakdown the top prospects in the upcoming NFL draft. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
